participant_1.background:
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
i m the youngest of five.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
I remember buying my first ice cream cone when I was four.
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
I like trains, and my grandma makes jewelry.
I wear comfortable clothing that allows me to move freely.
i enjoy john grisham movies , but not his books.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
I am good! I am getting ready to watch a movie. What about you?
I am getting over knee surgery so I am just relaxing today.
Oh no, I hope you heal quickly! What did you do to your knee?
I tore my ACL playing basketball.
Oh no! That sounds painful! I hope you feel better soon.
Thanks! I am getting there slowly but surely.
That's good to hear. What is your favorite movie genre?
I like action and comedy movies.
Me too! I also like suspenseful movies.
I have a dog named Snowball.
Aww, I love dogs! What kind of dog is he?
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy coats.
